articles.title: Heartbreak over son’s ‘pure accident’ death
articles.description: The parents of a teenage cricketer who died after being struck by a ball during a training exercise have spoken publicly, revealing their extraordinary support for the teammate who threw the fatal ball.

articles.author: Alex Blair
articles.title: Cricket stars snub ABC in nuclear boycott
articles.description: A rift has emerged between the ABC and Cricket Australia after former Test fast bowler and Cricket NSW board member Stuart Clark openly criticised the sporting authority’s bigwigs on-air.
articles.content:

articles.author: Mike Lorigan, Melissa Polimeni
articles.title: Ben Austin died in a cricketing tragedy. His parents Jace and Tracey blame no one as they speak out for the first time
articles.description: Ben Austin died after a cricket ball struck him in late October. For the first time his parents speak exclusively about the incident and their belief no one is to blame for the tragic accident.
articles.content:
Sitting on the boundary at his youngest son's cricket match, Jace Austin admits his relationship with the sport has changed.
"To say I watch it the same? No, definitely not," Jace said.
In late Oct… [+11140 chars]
